substeps.content: Kill Hillock
Grab Coast waypoint, go to Mud Flats
In Mudflats get 3 eggs and go to Submerged Passage, grab waypoint
Go to Coast Waypoint, head to Tidal Island and kill Hailrake
Back to Submerged Passage, go to the Ledge
Grab Waypoint, go to the Climb
Go to Lower Prison, grab Waypoint
Back to Submerged Passage, go kill Dweller of the Deeps
Back to town grab skillpoint
Take waypoint back to Lower Prison
Finish Labyrinth
Go to Warden's Quarter then Warden's Chamber and kill Brutus
Grab Prisoner's Gate waypoint, back to town to grab gems if necessary
Back to Prisoner's Gate, go to Ship Graveyard, grab waypoint
Go to Ship Graveyard Cave, grab Allflame
Go to Cavern of Wrath, get waypoint
Take waypoint to Ship Graveyard, kill Fairgraves
Back to town, get Skillpoint from Bestel and maybe gems from Nessa
Take waypoint to Cavern of Wrath, go to Cavern of Anger
Exit to Merveil's Lair and kill Merveil.
Exit to Act 2 and run through zone to enter the Forest Encampment.
Go right to the Old Fields
Go to the Den
Kill the White Beast
If you want return to town for your second Quicksilver Flask
Go right in the Old Fields to the Crossroads
Get waypoint in the middle of the zone
Go right to the Broken Brige
Find and Kill Kraityn
Back to Crossroads and down to Fellshrine Ruins
Enter the Crypt
Do Trial of Ascendancy in Crypt Level 1
Head left into the Riverways
Grab waypoint and go up into the Wetlands
Find and kill Oak
Grab waypoint and take waypoint back to Riverways
Go left into Western Forest, do the following 3 in any order
Find and help/kill Alira
Kill Blackguards at the and of the road. Use Thaumatic Seal to open Exit to Act 1
Find the Weaver's Nest, enter and kill the Weaver
Back to town, take waypoint to Act 1 Lioneye's Watch
Get Skillpoint from Bestel
Back to town in Act 2, killing Weaver should have unlocked some gems from Yeena
Take the waypoint to the Crossroads and go up into Chamber of Sins
Finish your Labyrinth Trial in the Chamber of Sins level 2
Find and kill Fidelitas and pick up the Baleful Gem
Go back to town for skill gems if any of your build are unlocked with the quest Intruders in Black
Gems from the quest The Root of the Problem are now unlocked at Yeena, check her if your build needs any
Take the waypoint to the Wetlands
Poison the Tree and enter the Vaal Ruins
Go through Vaal Ruins to enter Northern Forest
Travel through Northern Forest, don't enter Dread Thicket
Enter and run through the Caverns
Ascend the Vaal pyramid and kill the Act 2 boss
Exit into Act 3
Find the Blackguards and kill them to rescue Clarissa.
Make sure that you speak with Clarissa before running off.
Enter the Sarn Encampment. This is always found in the upper left part of the area.
Exit into the Slums.
Find the Crematorium and grab waypoint.
Find the Labyrinth trial in the Crematorium and complete it.
Find Piety and defeat her. Grab Tolman's Bracelet
Bring it to Clarissa in town to get Sewer Keys
Exit into the Slums again.
Find the Sewer graiting and enter the sewers.
Locate the three Platinum Busts. There is always one before the Waypoint, and two after it.
The Busts unlock a skillpoint so return them when you have an opportunity to go back to town.
Exit into the Marketplace and grab the waypoint
Up and right of the waypoint are the Catacombs.
Enter and complete the Labyrinth Trial.
Go back to Marketplace, e.g. via logout or portal back to town and using the waypoint.
Go to the Battlefront and find the waypoint around the middle of the area.
Down left from the waypoint is the Ribbon Spool for a quest.
Go to the Docks, they are usually at the upper left of the area.
In the Docks go find the Thaumatic Sulphite from the Supply Container.
If you want look for the waypoint, otherwise log out or portal back to town.
Back to Marketplace and then into Solaris Temple.
The entrance is north, east of the entrance to the Docks.
Run through Solaris Temple level 1 and 2 and talk to Dalia to finish quest.
Now back to Sewers and open the passage left of the waypoint. Go to Ebony Barracks.
Run northwest and kill Gravicious, afterwards head west to Lunaris Temple.
Run through the Lunaris Temple level 2 and kill Piety for the Tower Key.
Go back to town to get gem rewards, if you need any for your build.
There is also a skill point reward at Grigor.
Back to The Ebony Barracks and head east to the Imperial Gardens.
In the Imperial Gardens follow the road until you find the waypoint
From the waypoint take to path upwards to enter the Library if you need gems from the quest there.
In the Library find the loose Candle to enter the Archives.
In the Archives find the 4 Golden Pages and bring them to Siosa to unlock him as a gem vendor.
Back to Imperial Gardens and finish your Lab Trial in the upper right of the area.
Go do your Lab now since it will make fighting Dominus much easier.
Back to Imperial Gardens and take the right path to the Scepter of God.
Ascend the Scepter of God until you reach the roof. Kill Dominus
Exit to Act 4
Travel through the Aqueduct until you enter Highgate.
Enter the town and go left to the Dried Lake.
Kill Voll (and get the attack/cast speed crafting recipe)
Unlocking the mines unlocks some skill gems after talking to Oyun
Enter the mine after
Consider doing your first Delve after hitting sulphite to get the 2-3 Socket Recipe from the first Delve Node.
In the mines level 2 find Deshret's Spirit and release it for a skill point in town.
Travel through the Crystal Veins to the waypoint, then complete both side areas in any order.
After both are completed, new gems are unlocked in town.
Enter the Belly of the Beast and travel through level 1 and 2.
Continue to the Bowels of the Beast and defeat Piety.
Enter The Harvest and get the waypoint.
In The Harvest go in a circle and kill the 3 bosses to get the organs
Enter The Black Core when you have all 3 organs.
Kill Malachai and get back to Highgate.
From Town exit to The Ascent in the upper right part of town
Travel through The Ascent and interact with the resonator.
Take the Oriath Portal to exit into Act 5.
Travel through the Slave Pens and kill Overseer Crow
Ascend the ladder that drops after killing the Overseer and enter the Overseer's Tower.
Head through the Control Blocks and grab the Miasmeter in the top left.
Make your way up and right to the entrance to Oriath Square.
On your way there kill Justicar Casticus and take the Eyes of Zeal.
Run north east/east to the Templar Courts and get the waypoint.
Return to town to get an Onslaught Flask.
Head back to Templar Courts and run in a clockwise circle to The Chamber of Innocence.
Run in a counter clockwise circle to kill the boss (grab the movement speed recipe on the way).
Head back through the Torched Courts after the fight to the Ruined Square.
Here grab the Reliquary items to the south of the Square.
Fetch the Sign of Purity from The Ossuary to the north-west.
Head to town - update your flasks turn in your quest rewards (nothing important other than skill points).
Head to The Cathedral Rooftop to kill Kitava. You will suffer a permanent -30 resist penalty.
First clear the Twilight Strand left of town to unlock Lilly as gem vendor for all gems
